name: OPI Security Boost
author: Marcin Pietrzak

sections.description: OPI Security Boost plugin adds basic hardness to your site.
sections.installation:
There are 3 ways to install this plugin:

1. The super easy way

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add.
  2. Search for opi-security-boost.
  3. Click to install.
  4. Activate the plugin.

2. The easy way

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page.
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add.
  3. Select button Upload Plugin.
  4. Upload the .zip file you just downloaded.
  5. Activate the plugin.

3. The old and reliable way (FTP)

  1. Upload opi-security-boost folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
